thread.title: Nazi dad who named his son Adolf and daughter Eva Braun changes his own last name to Hitler
thread.title_full: Nazi dad who named his son Adolf and daughter Eva Braun changes his own last name to Hitler

author: Patrick Lion
title: Nazi dad who named his son Adolf and daughter Eva Braun changes his own last name to Hitler

persons.name: donalt trump share isidore heath campbell

text:
News Nazi dad who named his son Adolf and daughter Eva Braun changes his own last name to Hitler Superior Court Judge Michael O'Neill signed off on the request by Isidore Heath Campbell who also speaks highly of US President Donalt Trump Share Isidore Heath Campbell has won the right to change his surname to Hitler (Photo: Showtime) Share Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
A self-proclaimed Nazi dad who named his son Adolf and daughter Eva Bruan has won approval to change his own last name to Hitler. 
Superior Court Judge Michael O'Neill signed off on the request by Isidore Heath Campbell, granting Campbell's name change to Hitler from May 8. 
"I'm named after a hero," Campbell reportedly said. 
"The judge approved it. Isidore Heath Campbell (Photo: Showtime) Read More Hitler's phone - used to order millions of people to their deaths - sells for Â£161,000 at auction 
"My name is Hitler now." 
The dad had previously attracted headlines when a supermarket refused to decorate a birthday cake for his son, mycentraljersey.com reports. 
Despite the atrocities of World War 2, the father claims Hitler was a hero because "he saved Germany, he brought up the economy in Germany, built the roads in Germany, gave them more jobs in Germany, he considered the people in Germany." Adolf Hitler (Photo: Roger Viollet/Getty Images) Read More 
"Only Trump has considered the people in America. 
"Only Trump has. The rest of them were only in office for a pocket full of money. 
"Trump doesn't care about that. He cares about the people." 
One of his children is reportedly called Adolf Hitler Campbell while his daughter was named Eva Braun. 
However, he had run-ins with social services over the years. Like us on Facebook
